page.title: 13WALLENFELS - TWIN TOWN
page.content: Charters of friendship joining the towns of Bingham and Wallenfels (Bavaria) were signed in 1984. The main purpose in signing such an agreement is to encourage friendship, peace and goodwill. People of all ages and occupations should be involved, become friends and understand each other's points of view. Wallenfels is an attractive small town in the Franconian Forest. Everyone who has paid a visit to Bavaria has commented on the friendliness and the hospitality as well as the welcome that they received. Strong friendships have already been made between the children of Bingham and the twin town through exchange visits between the two.
